site.title: Vamshi Gundu
site.description: Software Engineer III at JPMorgan Chase & Co.

seo.title: Vamshi Gundu- Software Engineer III
seo.keywords: LLMs, AWS, Kubernetes, Python, ML, Portfolio
seo.author: G Vamshi Krishna

header.tagline: Software Engineer | ML & LLM Enthusiast | Cloud Native Developer

paragraphs: Experienced Software Engineer with 7+ years in developing AI/ML solutions, specializing in LLMs, AWS Cloud, and Kubernetes.
At JPMorgan Chase, I work on designing and deploying scalable machine learning models, building conversational AI agents, and creating innovative products that enhance the employee experience.

items.name: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with vanilla JavaScript.
Supports theme toggle, JSON-based content, and dynamic GitHub project listing.
Fully deployed and hosted via GitHub Pages.

items.name: AudioCast - Internal Podcast Tool
description: Built and showcased during JPMorgan Innovation Week 2025.
Converts text content into engaging audiobooks/podcasts using AWS Polly.
Focus on UX, audio content consumption trends, and internal productivity boost.

responsibilities: Designing and deploying ML pipelines using AWS SageMaker.
Developing LLM-based chat agents using OpenAI, LangChain, ChromaDB.
Contributed to AudioCast product for Innovation Week 2025, enhancing auditory content delivery for internal users.
Led microservice deployments on Kubernetes with Terraform and Spinnaker CI/CD.
Built machine learning solutions and APIs for insurance domain.
Won Rising Star award in Q4 2020 for project delivery and innovation.
Performed Java to Python migrations for legacy risk engine systems.
